comments.author: Sarah
comments.content: Here's hoping Seattle gets to the Portland level by the time I move out there in about 2 years! Those lucky Portlanders...

comments.author: JV
comments.content: My absolute favorite Portland Food Cart is DC Vegetarian. So delicious!

comments.author: Dawn
comments.content: Oh, I love Whiffies!  And those croquettes look awesome.

comments.author: Jacqui
comments.content: Love food carts, and Portland is great for it! You wouldn't happen to know of a reliable cart in Seattle for vegetarian food? I know there are so few, just curious.

comments.author: Michael Natkin
alessandra@clear.net.nz
comments.content: Nice to see that there is so much choice for vegetarians! Here it is still limited to the same old things...never mind, at least it forces me to be more creative at home ;-)

comments.author: Charlottes Vegetarian Blog
comments.content: I love the look of the van with the twinkle lights :) What a great idea. We don't really have that in Australia. Cool concept!

comments.author: crazy-c
comments.content: we love mono malo tapas-the orange scented croquettes are to die for --we go there ever chance we get

comments.author: sarah
comments.content: Reminds me of the pan-Latin food carts in Red Hook, Brooklyn. Absolutely delicious.

comments.author: Lana
comments.content: I'd like to see so much things for vegetarians  in my country.
